com.storehouse.app.order.model

Class Order

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.storehouse.app.order.model.Order
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Entity
public class Order
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class represents an order placed by a customer. It will be sent to a JMS queue and eventually being consumed and being processed.
    Author:
    ejiafzh
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void setInitialStatus()
